# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O vnfsdk-function-test-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT-linux64.tar.gz "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/vnf-sdk/function-test/standalone/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/standalone-1.1.0-20170201.012922-2-linux64.tar.gz" && tar -xf vnfsdk-function-test-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT-linux64.tar.gz && rm -f vnfsdk-function-test-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT-linux64.tar.gz
EXPOSE 8701
RUN echo Open-O vnfsdk-function-test 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/vnf-sdk/function-test/standalone/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/standalone-1.1.0-20170201.012922-2-linux64.tar.gz" > OPENO_VERSION
